title: Low priority when i haven't left games/afk
body:
So basically, After i finished my game (was only a bot game since i needed to kill 10-15 minutes) I get a message saying i'm placed in low priority queue for leaving matches, and so i thought maybe it was a bug or something, but when i queued up i was presented with another 20 minute cooldown (for some reason it always happens to me) And when i checked my match history i have no "leave" matches, nor did i leave the one i was present in, after all i killed the nexus with my own two hands.

So basically, is there some other way to be placed in low queue, and i somehow did it, or is this a bug?
Thanks to anyone that can help!
